title: I dont know when the project week will end and...
body: my birthday is on august 6th and I am getting a lot of rp that day, I would like to know if project week will still be available that day and also if someone got project chests like augmented caches and stuff like that will they be useless after project week ends or can we still open them if we hadent during project week. I have a lot of rp now but I'm getting more later and want to be able to open all the chests at one time for a live video.

replies.body: Hello my poro enthusiast friend!  Rineyy provided a solid [project compendium ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down)for the project event which I hope well help.  We also have a [project guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)if you have any questions on how-tos.  I know you've been waiting for these project skins, and hope it's everything you wanted.  An early happy birthday to you!
oh thank you, also will disruptor chests be released? I don't see them anywhere and I would like to get the disruptor icon

You bet!  The disruption cache will be available at a later time, per the [project guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ).  Please check it out when you have some time!

* The Project event will end at 23:59 PDT on August 16th for all regions.

[More info here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down)
